sections.content: The MANAGE function converts assessed risk into action plans. It focuses on prioritization, treatment tracking, and response readiness.

sections.title: Action bias
sections.content: Do not treat all risks equally. Prioritize by impact and controllability with explicit owners.

sections.caption: MANAGE executes treatment decisions informed by MAP and MEASURE evidence.

sections.content: Practice selecting the strongest containment and communication response path.

sections.prompt: A severe model failure impacts customers. Choose the best response sequence.

choices.label: Contain impact and activate incident protocol
Wait for weekly operations meeting
choices.feedback: Delayed containment increases risk and weakens trust.

choices.label: Notify stakeholders and document corrective actions
choices.feedback: This supports accountability, transparency, and structured recovery.

choices.label: Skip communications and silently patch
choices.feedback: Silent fixes undermine governance and downstream learning.

sections.content: Track mitigation execution so unresolved risks do not linger.
